item.title: Experienced YouTube Voice Over Artist For A Pokemon Channel (100 Voice Overs For $1500) - Upwork
item.description:
Description:
This channel will be an mix of Pokemon and education
You will be responsible for narrating 8–12-minute videos 1-2 times weekly
This is planned to be a LONG-TERM position with GREAT benefits such as bonuses and raises based on quality work and performance!

Requirements:
1. You are Fluent in English
2. You use professional equipment (No static etc. in recordings)
3. You can commit to a ~36h turnaround time
4. You are willing to work long term and grow with the team

Bonus:
1. You have an interest in Pokmeon/Science/Mythology
2. You have a enthusiastic voice that is engaging for this type of content
3. You have a sense of humor

(100 Voice Overs For $1500)
Please provide samples of previous work to be considered for the position!

Budget: $1,500
Posted On: June 18, 2024 04:11 UTC
Category: Voice Talent
Skills:Voice-Over, Male, Audio Editing, Voice Acting
Skills: Voice-Over, Male, Audio Editing, Voice Acting
Country: United States

item.title: We are looking for a YouTube Video Editor! - Upwork
item.description:
Job details:
Niche: Health & Nutrition
Number of videos: Around 4-12 per month.
Length of videos: Around 13-18 minutes long.
Turnaround Time: 24-48 hrs per video
Duration of job: We are looking for a Long-Term relationship (1+ Years)
---
Hey there! Thank you for considering our job post. We are looking for an experienced Video

Editor with previous experience working for YouTube channels.

We run multiple channels and we run a big channel in the Health & Nutrition niche. We will be creating videos on the following topics (initially): Health & Nutrition STORIES/FACTS

The video editor will be given a script and a voice over, his/her job will be to create a really complete and engaging video using that voice over and by performing the following tasks:

Add background music
Add existing clips from other videos (Under fair use) Add images
Add stock footage
Add Sound FX
Add transitions and titles
Among other tasks

Here is an example of the quality of videos we are looking for: https://youtu.be/fx0kIEOL59Q?si=bO8SEpiHV6-F4-0V

Having advanced English or being bilingual is a MUST, as well as being creative.
You also need to be resourceful since this job requires you to find online content that will help your video be more engaging and make it more impactful.
Some of the requirements to apply:
- Advanced video editing skills
- Previous experience working for YouTube channels (faceless channels preferred)
- Have access to Storyblocks or similar for stock images and clips.
- Creativity to enhance the video by making the script come to live (use of Sound FX, transitions, change in pacing, etc)

Please bid your price per video and send me some of your recent work [THIS IS A MUST].

Start your bid with “strawberrylemonade”, so we know you have read the post and understand the scope of the job.

Thanks in advance for your interest, and good luck.

Budget: $30
Posted On: June 18, 2024 04:02 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Explainer Video, Education
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Explainer Video, Education
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: General VA familiar with marketing, and Web Design - Upwork
item.description:
I am a Web Design, Development and Marketing Agency owner looking for a Virtual Assistant.

Please watch this first:

You MUST HAVE:
1) Excellent Written and verbal communication skills
2) Close to perfect English / American accent, being fluent in English
3) Excellent Notetaking skills
4) Excellent attention to details
5) Background or experience working in the Web Design, Marketing or design in general. You have to be familiar to talk about the different aspects of Web Design and familiar with Development enough to talk about it with the developers, designers and clients, in addition to making simple content edits on WordPress
6) Fast Learner who can work independently
7) Ability to work during US Eastern Time hours

Nice to Have:
1) Photoshop Skills
2) Video Editing Skills
3) You work on the Eastern Time Zone, meaning you're not going to be working overnight.
4) Proficiency in Google Sheets


Please record a short intro Loom video if you want to qualify. If you don't record a Loom video discussing your fit for this role, you WILL NOT be considered at all.

Next Steps / payment:
1) I will review the applicants and the loom video
2) I will select candidates who I think will be a good fit over a zoom chat
3) If we move forward, you will have a test project to do, which will be a small test project to determine your qualification and fit overall
4) If you do well on test project, we will start on a part-time (20 hours a week) basis. Payment for this will be $200 for the first month and then it will be month to month.
5) If everything goes well, I will hire full time (40 hours a week), with base salary of $400 - $500 depending on skill



Budget: $200
Posted On: June 18, 2024 04:00 UTC
Category: General Virtual Assistance
Skills:WordPress, Google Sheets, Digital Marketing, Ecommerce, Virtual Assistance
Skills: WordPress, Google Sheets, Digital Marketing, Ecommerce, Virtual Assistance
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Creative Explainer Video Creator - Upwork
item.description:
Creative Explainer Video Creator Wanted!!!

PORTFOLIO IS A MUST!!!

We're searching for a creative and tech-savvy Explainer Video Creator to join our team. Your role will involve crafting engaging and informative videos that break down complex ideas into simple, easy-to-understand visuals and narratives. Ideal candidates will have a strong background in graphic design, animation, and video editing, with a knack for storytelling and a keen eye for detail. If you're passionate about turning information into captivating visual stories and have experience with video production tools, we'd love to see your work.

This project requires you to work with zoom screen sharing.  If you are not ok with working with zoom screen sharing, please do not apply.

Work Hours 11:30AM to 6:00PM PST (Los Angeles Time) Monday-Friday (Weekend Optional)

Hourly Range: $10.00

item.title: Video Editor for Conservative Media Personality - Upwork
item.description:
Video Editor for Conservative Media Personality

We are seeking a skilled Video Editor to create high-quality video content for a prominent conservative platform. The ideal candidate will have expertise in video clipping, integration of video effects and animations, and a deep understanding of the American conservative content landscape. You will be responsible for producing engaging video content tailored for social media and YouTube.

Responsibilities:
- Edit and produce video content that aligns with the conservative brand and audience.
- Utilize video clipping, effects, and animations to enhance the storytelling and visual appeal.
- Ensure all video content is polished, professional, and ready for publication.
- Collaborate with an internal team to develop compelling video narratives.
- Integrate relevant graphics, animations, and other multimedia elements in content.
- Keep up-to-date with the latest trends in video editing and social media content.
- Ensure videos are optimized for various social media platforms and YouTube.
- Maintain the integrity and consistency of the brand’s messaging and tone.

Qualifications:
- Proven experience as a video editor (please provide a portfolio of past projects).
- Proficiency with video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, After Effects).
- Strong understanding of video clipping, effects, and animations.
- Familiarity with conservative content and the ability to work respectfully within this space.
- Experience in creating content for social media platforms and YouTube.
- Excellent communication skills and responsiveness to feedback
- Ability to work independently and deliver projects on deadline.

Project Deliverables:
- High-quality, edited video content ready for publication. (Ideal video length, 30 sec - 2 mins)
- A guide or documentation on video editing processes used.

How to Apply:
Please submit your application along with a portfolio showcasing your video editing experience. Include a brief cover letter explaining your interest in the project and your approach to creating video content for a conservative platform.

Budget: $30
Posted On: June 18, 2024 03:49 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Visual Effects, Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Visual Effects, Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Adobe After Effects
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Football YouTube Short Creator - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented individual to create a captivating football YouTube short video and post it on YouTube and other social networks. The video should be engaging, visually appealing, and highlight the best moments from football matches. This is an excellent opportunity for someone passionate about football and video editing to showcase their skills and gain exposure.

    Responsibilities:
    - Create a compelling football YouTube short video
    - Edit and enhance footage to create a visually stunning final product
    - Incorporate engaging effects, transitions, and music
    - Optimize the video for YouTube and other social networks

    Skills required:
    - Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
    - Creative thinking and ability to craft engaging narratives
    - Strong attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines

Requirement:

Create video title based on your idea, and creativity.
BONUS!!!! granted to the clip that goes viral.
CONTENT!!!! could be in many aspects, as such beautiful goals, best moments, amazing passes, crazy skills, and dribble. Focussing on World-Class football players such as Ronaldo, Messi, KDB, R9, Ronaldinho, you get the idea.

Example:
https://www.youtube.com/shorts/H_qh-7vylvA
https://www.youtube.com/shorts/m_EvktFGDbI
https://www.youtube.com/shorts/L6ifKiH1CAU
https://www.youtube.com/shorts/4-T-43Axb9Q
https://www.youtube.com/shorts/EjyiCI1hzzo



Budget: $150
Posted On: June 18, 2024 03:45 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Education, Videography
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Education, Videography
Country: Thailand

item.title: LOOKING for TIKTOK / YOUTUBE CONTENT CREATORS! (UGC) *California* - Upwork
item.description:
Have you always wanted to make YOUTUBE or TIKTOK videos for a living? Then THIS is the job for you!

We are currently hiring for a LARGE gaming YouTube channel and are looking for content creators in the LOS ANGELES area that are looking for FULL TIME work.

If selected, you would be creating content for a massive kids YouTube gaming channel full time. This would involve doing fun challenges, gameplays, and more.

An ideal candidate would be located in Los Angeles or the surrounding area, be obsessed with making videos and having YouTube as their full-time job, and be energetic and charismatic on camera.

If you are interested, please include a link to either your social media (TikTok, YouTube, or Instagram), or some sort of portfolio, such as an actor reel. Candidates that apply WITHOUT these will not be considered.

We look forward to hearing from you soon!

Hourly Range: $30.00-$55.00

item.ns0:encoded:
Have you always wanted to make YOUTUBE or TIKTOK videos for a living? Then THIS is the job for you!

We are currently hiring for a LARGE gaming YouTube channel and are looking for content creators in the LOS ANGELES area that are looking for FULL TIME work.

If selected, you would be creating content for a massive kids YouTube gaming channel full time. This would involve doing fun challenges, gameplays, and more.

An ideal candidate would be located in Los Angeles or the surrounding area, be obsessed with making videos and having YouTube as their full-time job, and be energetic and charismatic on camera.

If you are interested, please include a link to either your social media (TikTok, YouTube, or Instagram), or some sort of portfolio, such as an actor reel. Candidates that apply WITHOUT these will not be considered.

We look forward to hearing from you soon!

Hourly Range: $30.00-$55.00

item.title: Mobile game trailer - Upwork
item.description:
Hello!

We need a game trailer for our casual mobile game - Alchemy AI. Game is pretty simple and straightforward, but we have a lot of unique for this genre features that we want to communicate to users better.

[IOS] (https://apps.apple.com/us/app/alchemic-ai-infinity-mix/id6466730288)

[Android] (https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.hostelguys.alchemicai)

Video will be used in mobile app stores listings + part of the tutorial.

~1 min length, portrait orientation, several resolutions / aspect ratios, 2D animation, ~5 scenes max, narration + sound

Thanks for your offers, we are open to discussions!




Budget: $600
Posted On: June 18, 2024 03:18 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Commercial, Animation, Trailer, Graphic Design, Adobe After Effects, 2D Animation, Game Design
Skills: Video Commercial, Animation, Trailer, Graphic Design, Adobe After Effects, 2D Animation, Game Design
Country: United States
